name: 30 Seconds Left
description:
Instruction:

You have only 30 seconds left to get to the goal. Be quick!

Controls:

Moving: A and D/Left and right arrow keys
Jumping: Space bar/Shift/W/Up arrow key
Restart: R
Move to next level (after finish the current level): E
Return to Menu: Esc

Credits:

All the graphics, art and music were made by ntb896.

Update:

1.0.1: Level 10 has been tweaked to be a little bit easier in order to reduce the frustration of player when play it.

Feel free to leave any feedback in the comment.
